message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CR 

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and text classification. It could also belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it involves the identification of relevant information from a large corpus of text. Additionally, the use of machine learning techniques such as LSI and Sprinkled LSI suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning) or cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the focus on detecting deceptive opinion spam could also place it in the sub-category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security).
